Description:
Verify that changes to an item are saved without loss of item
      integrity.
surf using user-defined 'custom keyword'.
Verify that columns are resizable to show/hide more of entries
Show and hide columns.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

113893Implement New Form Functionality
      (waiting on bug status)

Verify that a form fill popup menu is activated
      when a field gets accessed that has been saved in form
      manager data.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't send Instant Messages."

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays
        correctly
Delete multiple History entries
sort and reverse-sort per column
Test lifecycle of applets

Verify that when you have saved a username and password for a website
      and you later change the password, that password manager picks up the new
      password

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager
Determine if XML pages print properly
Determine if HTML 4.0 pages print properly
Determine if quicktime movies play properly
Verify that just clicking Search button goes to search page
Check that addition of a panel works
Verify that links in Bookmarks work

Open a web location (URL) in the current Navigator window. Includes
        test to dismiss dialog.

Attempt to view page info for plain text, xml, ftp listing,
        directory listing...

The active window is visually distinct, inactive = grey title
        bar.
Verify that each buttons executes as appropriate.
